TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ForestTrustRelationshipInformation extends System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustRelationshipInformation

Docs.summary: The ForestTrustRelationshipInformation class contains information about a trust relationship between two <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest"> objects.
Gets the excluded top-level names in the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustRelationshipInformation"> object.
Docs.value: A read/write <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection> that contains the excluded top-level names in the current object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save() cil managed

Docs.summary: Commits any changes to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustRelationshipInformation"> properties to the Active Directory Domain Services store.
Gets the top-level names in the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustRelationshipInformation"> object.
Docs.value: A read-only <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TopLevelNameCollection"> object that contains the top-level names in the current object.

Docs.summary: Gets the trusted domain information for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainInformation"> object.
Docs.value: A read-only <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainInfoCollection"> object that contains the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainInformation> object for the current object.
